feed.title: Mailcow Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Mailcow: üèÆüêÑ Moovember | Mailbox Rename, SOGo 5.11.1, Rspamd 3.10.2, and More | Revision A
entry.content:
[!NOTE]
This Release Marks Revision A for 2024-11 and is fixing some critical bugs from 2024-11

What's Changed

  • update.sh: precaution ask for deletion of dns_blocklists.cf if old format by @DerLinkman in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6154
  • [Web] Updated lang.zh-cn.json by @milkmaker in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6151
  • compose: bump sogo version to include 5.11.2 by @DerLinkman in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6156
  • php: use correct php image + workaround of #6149 by @DerLinkman & @FreddleSpl0it in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6159

Full Changelog: https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/compare/2024-11...2024-11a

entry.title: New release for Mailcow: üèÆüêÑ Moovember | Mailbox Rename, SOGo 5.11.1, Rspamd 3.10.2, and More | Revision B
entry.content:
[!NOTE]
This Release Marks Revision B for 2024-11 and is fixing some bugs from 2024-11(a)

What's Changed

  • mysql: increased thread_stack to 192k since 10.5.27 by @DerLinkman in d10d64dd9216ca0d0f70280a3c7a4c12bbc463dc
  • [Web] broadcast maildir move to dovecot containers on mailbox_rename by @FreddleSpl0it in 6d1f7482edae6927fa1b2b540d5ef11fa8e2bcb2
  • [Web] update _sogo_static_view on password reset by @FreddleSpl0it in b9f52df3f10e43c1fc9364ff0ef5a6008d959a40

Full Changelog: https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/compare/2024-11a...2024-11b

entry.title: New release for Mailcow: üê•üêÑ Febmooary 2025 Update | Rspamd and MariaDB Update
entry.content:
[!IMPORTANT] Dovecot previously allowed multiple login attempts within a single session without triggering Netfilter. This issue has now been addressed. Administrators should reset Fail2Ban Regex: System ‚Üí Configuration ‚Üí Options ‚Üí Fail2Ban Parameters ‚Üí Expand Regex Filters ‚Üí Click "Reset to Default"

[!CAUTION] This mailcow release upgrades mariadb from 10.5 to 10.11 to align with the current EOLs of mariadb for the next years. Please do not modify the image version from mariadb inside the docker-compose.yml on your own as serious damage may occur if the code has not been adapted properly

Also notice, that you cannot downgrade mariadb databases from 10.11 back to 10.5!

[!NOTE] This release changes the image source for our own build docker images from Docker Hub to GitHub due to Docker's upcoming ratelimits. If interested, read Dockers limitations here: https://docs.docker.com/docker-hub/usage/

What's Changed

  • Fix check_prs_if_on_staging workflow by @MAGICCC in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6286
  • Update generate_config.sh version checking for wider compatibility by @digitalhen in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6270
  • chore(deps): update devops-infra/action-pull-request action to v0.6.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6302
  • Ffdhe2048 by @dragoangel in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6223
  • Adding lines to docker-compose.yml to allow for simpler SOGo web client UI customisation by @Babybatrick in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6220
  • Translations update from Weblate by @milkmaker in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6307
  • Update Rspamd to 3.11.0 and enable SMTPUTF8 for outgoing mail by @dragoangel in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6216
  • [Mariadb] Update to 10.11 (LTS) by @DerLinkman in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/5152
  • Move sed cmd to remove discontinued DNSBLs by @MAGICCC in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6315
  • [Dovecot][Netfilter] Fix dovecot failed login regex by @FreddleSpl0it in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6309
  • rspamd: upgraded rspamd to 3.11.0-2 (incl. NIXSPAM Removal) by @DerLinkman in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6328
  • Fix #2752 - Allow domain recipients for address rewrite by @PseudoResonance in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6155
  • compose: use ghcr.io for new/current mailcow docker images by @DerLinkman in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6332
  • Prompt user before applying major updates by @FreddleSpl0it in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6330
  • use ghcr.io for backupimage by @MAGICCC in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6333
  • Fix #5892 - Adding a domain wide footer leads to broken attachments
  • Fix #6305 - Use Redis ACL user quota_notify with restricted access https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/commit/ef2f5f7be0c2992580c1290e36d08bb73348600e
  • Fix incorrect session lifetime in sogo-auth.php https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/commit/aaa7e4a184e2126bc0fa76e600cebb984aff29dc
  • [Nginx] Add support for trusted proxies via env var https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/commit/a567d5dc3193286684fdf0b7cf287817bdfe6581
  • [Redis] Add support for masterauth via env var https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/commit/351f4ce787542b05dab8ad5c39c00429ef02233b

New Contributors

  • @digitalhen made their first contribution in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6270
  • @Babybatrick made their first contribution in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6220
  • @PseudoResonance made their first contribution in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6155

Full Changelog: https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/compare/2025-01a...2025-02

entry.title: New release for Mailcow: üíêüêÑ Mooay 2025 Update | Identity Provider Improvements and Bug Fixes
entry.content:
What's Changed

Features

  • feat(olefy): Allow disabling Olefy by @marvinruder in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6398
  • Allow additional domains in OAuth2 redirect URLs by @PseudoResonance in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6483
  • [Web] Add quick links to other login pages and mailcow login toggle by @FreddleSpl0it in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6521
  • [Web] Add identity_provider option to disable auto-creation of users on login by @FreddleSpl0it in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6530

Changes

  • Translations update from Weblate by @milkmaker in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6463
  • Translations update from Weblate by @milkmaker in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6478
  • Update dependency Imagick/imagick to v3.8.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6480
  • Translations update from Weblate by @milkmaker in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6502
  • Replace bgp.he.net with bgp.tools by @NickBouwhuis in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6376
  • [Postfix] update postscreen_access.cidr by @milkmaker in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6509

Bug Fixes

  • [Dovecot] Fix EAS login issue with app passwords and improve auth cache handling in Dovecot by @FreddleSpl0it in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6488
  • Check if skip_sogo is not set before redirecting to SOGo by @Kuehn-Andreas in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6495
  • [Web] Fix force password update at next login by @FreddleSpl0it in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6487
  • rspamd: remove .info from fishy tlds (default) by @DerLinkman in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6342
  • [Fix] Moving mails by functions.quarantine.inc.php to inbox failed by @mrclschstr in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6506
  • Fix typo in rspamd rule in composites.conf by @krzsztf1 in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6515
  • fix: typo in default_template by @seclution in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6518
  • Update legacy admin dashboard links by @Habetdin in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6485

New Contributors

  • @Kuehn-Andreas made their first contribution in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6495
  • @NickBouwhuis made their first contribution in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6376
  • @krzsztf1 made their first contribution in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6515
  • @seclution made their first contribution in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6518

Full Changelog: https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/compare/2025-03b...2025-05

entry.title: New release for Mailcow: üî•üêÑ Mooly Update 2025 | Security Update
entry.content:
‚ö†Ô∏è Vulnerability fixed‚ö†Ô∏è

This update addresses a critical vulnerability that allowed Remote Code Execution (RCE) by authenticated admin users.
All users are strongly advised to update. A CVE will follow the next Days.

What's Changed

  • compose: add selinux label to mysql-socket-vol (permission) by @DerLinkman in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6560
  • [Postfix] update postscreen_access.cidr by @milkmaker in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6573
  • [Postfix] update postscreen_access.cidr by @milkmaker in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6611
  • [ACME] Remove deprecated ACME_CONTACT variable by @FreddleSpl0it in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6617
  • [Dovecot] Use Jinja2 sandbox for rendering quota and quarantine notif‚Ä¶ by @FreddleSpl0it in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6631
  • Translations update from Weblate by @milkmaker in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6548
  • Translations update from Weblate by @milkmaker in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6552
  • Translations update from Weblate by @milkmaker in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6582
  • Translations update from Weblate by @milkmaker in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6589
  • Translations update from Weblate by @milkmaker in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6599
  • Translations update from Weblate by @milkmaker in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6600
  • Translations update from Weblate by @milkmaker in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6601
  • Translations update from Weblate by @milkmaker in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6609
  • Translations update from Weblate by @milkmaker in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6614
  • Translations update from Weblate by @milkmaker in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6622
  • Translations update from Weblate by @milkmaker in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6629

Full Changelog: https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/compare/2025-05...2025-07
